name: Introduction to Sociology
description: An introduction to the conceptual and empirical foundations of the discipline intended on providing a foundation for subsequent Sociology and Criminology, Law and Society courses and programs. Students will learn the sociological approach of theory and inquiry to a range of topics. [24L]
exclusions: SOC101Y5, SOC100H1, SOC101Y1, SOC102H1, SOC103H1, SOCA01H3, SOCA02H3
